_header: Peace be / In virtue of thee
Subjects: scripture, Engl. trans. of; peace; translations
_description: One couplet, translating ‘Fiat pax in virtute tua’ (Ps. 121.7) which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
